summary: The UK Movies and Entertainment Market is projected to grow from US$ 3.97 billion in 2025 to US$ 6.74 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 6.83%. headline: Comcast Advertising Appoints Former Snap Executive James Borow to Lead Universal Ads
summary: NEW YORK, February 24, 2026--Comcast Advertising today announced it named James Borow as General Manager of Universal Ads, which enables brands of any size to create, buy and measure ads across premium video. In this role, Borow will lead strategy, operations and execution of the self-service ad buying platform as it continues to evolve and scale.
